آسٹریلین گرانڈ پری کی 1932 کی ریس کا کل: 1932 Australian Grand Prix total distance 1932 Australian Grand Prix race length
The 1932 Australian Grand Prix was a motor race held at the Phillip Island circuit in Victoria, Australia on 14 March 1932.
1932 Australian Grand Prix total distance 1932 Australian Grand Prix race length

Length. 6.463 (Miles). Record. Bill Thompson (Bugatti T37A), 4m49.4, 80.397 mph, Formule Libre, 1932. 3,453. Championships. View. 19,753. Results. View. 25,728.

Australian Grand Prix ; 306.124 km (190.216 miles) · 58.
1932 Australian Grand Prix total distance 1932 Australian Grand Prix race length

It was the first Australian Grand Prix to be decided on a straight handicap basis, with the winner being the first car to complete the 31 laps. The two "scratch" competitors had to concede starts ranging up to 29 minutes, equating to an advantage of four laps.
